item.description:
It has been scientifically proven that there is no better feeling than hitting a strike and seeing the pins scatter around*. So knock those pins down and show them who's boss.

Lang's Lanes is a familiar sight off Route 10, with a sprawling array of lanes, a bar and an interactive scoring system. What better way to start the week than with 10 frames and a fun bunch of people?

So come on down and beat the Monday blues. Remember, the dude abides....

Hope to see you there.

 

 

 

 

 

* not really
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us by the lanes
item.name: Bowling, Bowling, Bowling
